data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a Columbus throw-in in Seattle's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 5, Columbus drive upfield and Jonathan Mensah gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seattle defender.
Throw-in Columbus.
Throw-in for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 7, Columbus are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Seattle.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Columbus.
Columbus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus drives forward and Gyasi Zardes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
Seattle's Jordan Morris gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Seattle in the half of Columbus.
Goal! Lucas Zelarrayan gives Columbus a 1-0 lead in Columbus.
Harrison Afful with an assist there.
In the minute 26, Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 28, Columbus have a dangerous throw-in.
Joao Paulo is booked for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 31, It's now 2-0 in Columbus as Derrick Etienne scores for Columbus.
That's a fine assist from Lucas Zelarrayan.
In Columbus, Columbus push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 34, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In Columbus Columbus attack through Luis Diaz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 37, Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 40, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Columbus.
In the minute 43, Columbus are pushing forward but Aidan Morris's finish is wide of the goal.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 45, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Mapfre Stadium.
Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Nouhou Tolo with Bradley Shaun Smith. This is the second substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
The away team replace Joevin Jones with Gustav Svensson.
In the minute 47, Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 48, Seattle's Cristian Roldan gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Bradley Shaun Smith (Seattle) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Free kick in a good position for Seattle!
Can Seattle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Columbus's half?
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 51, Cristian Roldan (Seattle) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 56, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Seattle.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 60, In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kelvin Leerdam is on a sub for Alex Roldan for Seattle.
Seattle make their fourth substitution with Will Bruin replacing Joao Paulo.
In the minute 61, Luis Diaz of Columbus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Columbus.
In the minute 63, Columbus to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Jair Marrufo signals a Columbus throw-in in Seattle's half.
Throw-in for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 64, Seattle needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milton Valenzuela for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Artur is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Columbus's area.
Artur is back on his feet again.
In the minute 71, In Columbus Seattle attack through Nicolas Lodeiro. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Gustav Svensson's header is off-target for Seattle.
In the minute 74, Columbus have a goal kick.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Free kick Columbus.
In the minute 76, Columbus have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Columbus are coming forward and Jonathan Mensah gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a fifth substitution, with Jimmy Medranda replacing Shane O'Neill.
Columbus are whistled for offside.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick Seattle.
Seattle apply pressure at Mapfre Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Jordan Morris but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 81, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Goal! Lucas Zelarrayan extends Columbus's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Luis Diaz to set up the goal.
In the minute 83, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Hector Jimenez is replacing Derrick Etienne for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Columbus.
In the minute 85, Raul Ruidiaz of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Bradley Shaun Smith for Seattle who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 87, Bradley Shaun Smith is back on the pitch.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seattle's Nicolas Lodeiro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 87, Jair Marrufo awards Columbus a goal kick.
Gyasi Zardes for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
Caleb Porter is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Fatai Alashe replacing Artur.
Throw-in high up the field for Columbus in Columbus.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Goal kick for Seattle at Mapfre Stadium.
In Columbus Seattle drive forward through Raul Ruidiaz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
Waylon Francis is replacing Luis Diaz for the home team.
